review: I took this for 2 + months after taking 40 mg crestor for years and it started causing muscle cramps.  The doc gave me Lipitor 80mg caused severe myopathy and was so bad for me I thought it was the end of me !!! 54 yrs old male on Crestor 40 mg for 15 years and stable at 200 tot col, I think they gave me too strong dose too quickly
This caused me severe muscle pain and cramps .
